synonyms: have (to one's name) "I own this house"

definitions.definition: admit or acknowledge that something is the case or that one feels a certain way.
examples: she owned to a feeling of profound jealousy
synonyms: confess "she had to own that she agreed"

definitions.definition: take or acknowledge full responsibility for (something).
examples: I emphasize the importance of owning our anger and finding ways to control it

definitions.definition: acknowledge paternity, authorship, or possession of.
examples: he has published little, trivial things which he will not own
yeah right, she totally owned you, man
